00041 #ifndef _xmltext_cpp
00042 #define _xmltext_cpp
00043 
00044 #include "xmltext.h"
00045 #include "exception.h"
00046 
00047 #define TIXML_USE_TICPP
00048 #include <ticpp.h>
00049 
00050 namespace phys
00051 {
00052     namespace xml
00053     {
00054         Text::Text (ticpp::Text* Meta, bool FirstTimeUsed)
00055         {
00056             this->Wrapped = Meta;
00057             if (FirstTimeUsed)
00058                 { this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped(); }
00059         }
00060 
00061         Text* Text::GetPointerFromWrapped(ticpp::Text* Meta)
00062         {
00063             Text* Other;
00064             try {
00065                 //Most likely cause of failure is ticpp::Node::GetBasePointer() returns 0
00066                 Other = static_cast<Text*>( Meta->GetBasePointer()->GetUserData() );
00067             } catch (ticpp::Exception e) {
00068                 std::stringstream temp;
00069                 temp << "Could not Create phys::xml::Text from invalid pointer." << std::endl << e.what() << std::endl << "Details: " << e.m_details;
00070                 throw Exception(temp.str());
00071             }
00072 
00073             //If there is no pointer inside TinyXML to our node, then it doesn't exist, so make it Otherwise use what is there
00074             if(0 == Other)
00075                 { Other = new Text(Meta, true); }
00076             return Other;
00077         }
00078 
00079         Text::Text(String Value)
00080         {
00081             this->Wrapped=new ticpp::Text(Value);
00082             this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00083         }
00084 
00085         Text::Text()
00086         {
00087             this->Wrapped=new ticpp::Text();
00088             this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00089         }
00090 
00091         Base::XMLComponentType Text::GetType() const
00092             { return Base::isText; }
00093 
00094         std::istream& Text::operator>> (std::istream &In)
00095             { return In >> *(static_cast <ticpp::Text*>(this->Wrapped)); }
00096 
00097         std::ostream& Text::operator<< (std::ostream &Out)
00098             { return Out << *(static_cast <ticpp::Text*>(this->Wrapped)); }
00099 
00100     }// /xml
00101 }// /phys
00102 
00103 #endif
